overview.en: HDC is a general economic ecological system of planting management, sales and buyback, dividend management and digital asset management, which is jointly initiated by the HCY team composed of medicinal herbs planting enthusiasts from all over the world and developed based on block chain technology.
overview.zh: 百药链HDC是由各地药材种植爱好者组成HCY团队共同发起，基于区块链技术开发的种植管理、销售回购、分红管理、数字资产管理为一体的通证经济生态体系。
